name: ABIEL S.r.l.
goal: Our mission is to develop, produce and commercialize new molecules and substances active in the lysis of the extracellular matrix. We are specially interested in new enzymes that are capable of optimizing tissue digestion procedures with particular regard to the field of regenerative medicine. In addition we aim to become a leader in the research and industrial production of lytic enzymes through the constant applied research and the worldwide sales of our innovative products.
